meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of handwriting
meanings.sent1: Her chirographic style was elegant and neat.
meanings.sent2: The chirographic note was easy to read and understand.
meanings.sent3: His chirographic skills were so good that he could write with his eyes closed!
meanings.sent4: The chirographic beauty of her signature stood out on the document.
meanings.sent5: The chirographic artistry of the calligrapher left everyone in awe.

meanings.sent1: The chirographic on the letter revealed the sender's identity.
meanings.sent2: She carefully examined the chirographic on the contract before signing.
meanings.sent3: The detective analyzed the chirographic for clues to solve the case.
meanings.sent4: The chirographic at the bottom of the page marked the end of the agreement.
meanings.sent5: The historical document's chirographic was preserved in a museum for all to see.
